member.name: M:ZS.ZSDialog.ShowMultiSelectOpenFileDialog(Microsoft.SmallBasic.Library.Primitive)
member.summary: Shows an open file dialog with multi-select enabled and returns the selected file paths.
member.param: The file types filter in the format "Display Name1|Pattern1|Display Name2|Pattern2|...".
member.returns: A semicolon-separated list of selected file paths or an empty string if canceled.
member.remarks: Filters should be specified in pairs where: - Display Name: The name shown in the dialog's filter dropdown. - Pattern: The file pattern to filter files by extension (e.g., "*.txt", "*.jpg"). Multiple filters can be separated by vertical bars ('|'). For example: "Text Files|*.txt|All Files|*.*"

member.name: M:ZS.ZSMath.Abs(Microsoft.SmallBasic.Library.Primitive)
member.summary: Returns the absolute value of a specified number.
member.param: A number whose absolute value is to be found.
member.returns: The absolute value of the specified number.

member.name: M:ZS.ZSMath.Acos(Microsoft.SmallBasic.Library.Primitive)
member.summary: Returns the angle whose cosine is the specified number.
member.param: A number representing a cosine, where d must be greater than or equal to -1, but less than or equal to 1.
member.returns: The angle, measured in radians, whose cosine is the specified number.

member.name: M:ZS.ZSMath.Asin(Microsoft.SmallBasic.Library.Primitive)
member.summary: Returns the angle whose sine is the specified number.
member.param: A number representing a sine, where d must be greater than or equal to -1, but less than or equal to 1.
member.returns: The angle, measured in radians, whose sine is the specified number.

member.name: M:ZS.ZSMath.Atan(Microsoft.SmallBasic.Library.Primitive)
member.summary: Returns the angle whose tangent is the specified number.
member.param: A number representing a tangent.
member.returns: The angle, measured in radians, whose tangent is the specified number.

member.name: M:ZS.ZSMath.Atan2(Microsoft.SmallBasic.Library.Primitive,Microsoft.SmallBasic.Library.Primitive)
member.summary: Returns the angle whose tangent is the quotient of two specified numbers.
member.param: The y-coordinate of a point.
The x-coordinate of a point.
member.returns: The angle, measured in radians, whose tangent is the quotient of two specified numbers.

member.name: M:ZS.ZSMath.Ceiling(Microsoft.SmallBasic.Library.Primitive)
member.summary: Returns the smallest integer greater than or equal to the specified number.
member.param: A number.
member.returns: The smallest integer greater than or equal to the specified number.

member.name: M:ZS.ZSMath.Cos(Microsoft.SmallBasic.Library.Primitive)
member.summary: Returns the cosine of the specified angle.
member.param: An angle, measured in radians.
member.returns: The cosine of the specified angle.

member.name: M:ZS.ZSMath.Cosh(Microsoft.SmallBasic.Library.Primitive)
member.summary: Returns the hyperbolic cosine of the specified angle.
member.param: An angle, measured in radians.
member.returns: The hyperbolic cosine of the specified angle.

member.name: M:ZS.ZSMath.Exp(Microsoft.SmallBasic.Library.Primitive)
member.summary: Returns e raised to the specified power.
member.param: A number specifying a power.
member.returns: The number e raised to the specified power.

member.name: M:ZS.ZSMath.Floor(Microsoft.SmallBasic.Library.Primitive)
member.summary: Returns the largest integer less than or equal to the specified number.
member.param: A number.
member.returns: The largest integer less than or equal to the specified number.

member.name: M:ZS.ZSMath.IEEERemainder(Microsoft.SmallBasic.Library.Primitive,Microsoft.SmallBasic.Library.Primitive)
member.summary: Returns the remainder resulting from the division of a specified number by another specified number.

A divisor.
member.returns: A number equal to x - (y * Q), where Q is the quotient of x / y rounded to the nearest integer.

member.summary: Executes a PowerShell command and returns the result.

member.name: T:ZS.ZSProcess
member.summary: Provides methods and properties for managing processes. This class allows you to start new processes, manage process information, and interact with running processes. It includes functionalities for: - Starting processes with or without arguments - Retrieving process IDs and names - Getting and setting process-related information such as file path, arguments, priority, and more

member.name: M:ZS.ZSProcess.StartProcess(Microsoft.SmallBasic.Library.Primitive)
member.summary: Starts a new process with the specified executable file path.
member.param: The path of the executable file to start. Example: "C:\\Windows\\System32\\notepad.exe"

member.name: M:ZS.ZSProcess.StartProcessWithArgs(Microsoft.SmallBasic.Library.Primitive,Microsoft.SmallBasic.Library.Primitive)
member.summary: Starts a new process with the specified executable file path and arguments.
member.param: The path of the executable file to start. Example: "C:\\Windows\\System32\\cmd.exe"
The arguments to pass to the executable file. Example: "/c echo Hello World"

member.name: M:ZS.ZSProcess.StartProcessWithInfo(Microsoft.SmallBasic.Library.Primitive,Microsoft.SmallBasic.Library.Primitive)
member.summary: Starts a new process with the specified ProcessStartInfo.
member.param: The path of the executable file to start. Example: "C:\\Windows\\System32\\notepad.exe"
The arguments to pass to the executable file. Example: ""

member.name: M:ZS.ZSProcess.GetProcessIds
member.summary: Gets a list of process IDs for all running processes on the local machine.
member.returns: A comma-separated string of process IDs. Example: "1234,5678"

member.name: M:ZS.ZSProcess.GetProcessName(Microsoft.SmallBasic.Library.Primitive)
member.summary: Gets the process name for a specified process ID.
member.param: The process ID. Example: 1234
member.returns: The process name. Example: "notepad"

member.name: M:ZS.ZSProcess.GetProcessId
member.summary: Gets the process ID of the currently managed process.
member.returns: The process ID. Example: 1234

member.name: M:ZS.ZSProcess.GetStartTime
member.summary: Gets the start time of the currently managed process.
member.returns: The start time of the process. Example: "2024-07-24 14:30:00"

member.name: M:ZS.ZSProcess.GetExitTime
member.summary: Gets the exit time of the currently managed process.
member.returns: The exit time of the process. Example: "2024-07-24 15:00:00"

member.name: M:ZS.ZSProcess.HasExited
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the currently managed process has exited.
member.returns: true if the process has exited; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:ZS.ZSProcess.GetMainWindowTitle
member.summary: Gets the title of the main window of the currently managed process.
member.returns: The main window title. Example: "Untitled - Notepad"

member.name: M:ZS.ZSProcess.IsResponding
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the currently managed process is responding.
member.returns: true if the process is responding; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:ZS.ZSProcess.GetTotalProcessorTime
member.summary: Gets the total processor time for the currently managed process.
member.returns: The total processor time. Example: "00:00:01.2345678"

member.name: P:ZS.ZSProcess.FilePath
member.summary: Gets or sets the file path of the application to start.
member.example:
To set the file path:
ZSProcess.FilePath = "C:\\Windows\\System32\\notepad.exe"

member.name: P:ZS.ZSProcess.Arguments
member.summary: Gets or sets the arguments to pass to the executable file.
member.example:
To set arguments:
ZSProcess.Arguments = "/c echo Hello World"

member.name: P:ZS.ZSProcess.UseShellExecute
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to use the operating system shell to start the process.
member.example:
To enable shell execution:
ZSProcess.UseShellExecute = true

member.name: P:ZS.ZSProcess.RedirectStandardOutput
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines whether to redirect standard input, output, and error streams.

member.name: P:ZS.ZSProcess.PriorityClass
member.summary: Gets or sets the value of the process priority.

member.name: P:ZS.ZSProcess.CreateNoWindow
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to create a new window for the process.
member.example:
To disable window creation:
ZSProcess.CreateNoWindow = true

member.name: T:ZSProcessInfo
member.summary: Provides ProcessInfo Functions from Small Basic. First Set All the setting then call the method ZSProcessInfo.Start()

member.name: M:ZSProcessInfo.Start
member.summary: Starts the process using the specified settings.

member.name: P:ZSProcessInfo.Arguments
member.summary: Gets or sets the set of command-line arguments to use when starting the application. Setting For ZSProcess.Start()

member.name: P:ZSProcessInfo.CreateNoWindow
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to start the process in a new window. Setting For ZSProcess.Start()

member.name: P:ZSProcessInfo.Domain
member.summary: Gets or sets the domain to use when starting the process. Setting For ZSProcess.Start()

member.name: P:ZSProcessInfo.UseShellExecute
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use the operating system shell to start the process. Setting For ZSProcess.Start()

member.name: P:ZSProcessInfo.FileName
member.summary: Gets or sets the application or document to start. Setting For ZSProcess.Start()

member.name: P:ZSProcessInfo.RedirectStandardError
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the error output of an application is written to the StandardError stream. Setting For ZSProcess.Start()

member.name: P:ZSProcessInfo.RedirectStandardInput
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the input for an application is read from the StandardInput stream. Setting For ZSProcess.Start()

member.name: P:ZSProcessInfo.RedirectStandardOutput
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the output of an application is written to the StandardOutput stream. Setting For ZSProcess.Start()

member.name: P:ZSProcessInfo.UserName
member.summary: Gets or sets the user name to use when starting the process. Setting For ZSProcess.Start()

member.name: P:ZSProcessInfo.Password
member.summary: Gets or sets the password for the user name when starting the process. Note: For security reasons, setting passwords is not directly supported in this wrapper. Setting For ZSProcess.Start()

member.name: P:ZSProcessInfo.Verb
member.summary: Gets or sets the verb to use when opening the application or document specified by the FileName property. Setting For ZSProcess.Start()

member.name: P:ZSProcessInfo.WindowStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the Window style to use for the process. Setting For ZSProcess.Start()

member.name: P:ZSProcessInfo.WorkingDirectory
member.summary: Gets or sets the working directory for the process to be started. Setting For ZSProcess.Start()

member.name: P:ZSProcessInfo.StandardOutputEncoding
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the output of an application is written to the StandardOutput stream. Setting For ZSProcess.Start()

member.name: P:ZSProcessInfo.EnvironmentVariables
member.summary: Gets or sets the environment variables that apply to this process and its child processes. Use a semicolon (;) to separate multiple variables. Example: "Path=C:\Windows\System32;TEMP=C:\Temp" Setting For ZSProcess.Start()

member.name: P:ZSProcessInfo.ErrorDialog
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an error dialog box is displayed to the user if the process cannot be started. Setting For ZSProcess.Start()

member.name: P:ZSProcessInfo.LoadUserProfile
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Windows user profile should be loaded.

member.name: P:ZSProcessInfo.PasswordInClearText
member.summary: Gets or sets the password in clear text to use when starting the process.

member.name: T:ZS.ZSGlobalization
member.summary: Provides methods and properties for working with globalization, including culture information, date and time formatting, number formatting, and text information. This class also includes support for various calendars such as Gregorian, Hijri, Chinese, and Korean.

member.name: P:ZS.ZSGlobalization.CurrentCulture
member.summary: Gets or sets the current culture. Example: "en-US"
member.example:
Get the current culture:
currentCulture = ZSGlobalization.CurrentCulture
Set the current culture to French (France):
ZSGlobalization.CurrentCulture = "fr-FR"

member.name: P:ZS.ZSGlobalization.Calendar
member.summary: Gets the name of the calendar used by the current culture. Example: "GregorianCalendar"

member.name: P:ZS.ZSGlobalization.ShortDatePattern
member.summary: Gets or sets the date and time pattern for short dates. Example: "MM/dd/yyyy"
member.example:
Get the short date pattern:
shortDatePattern = ZSGlobalization.ShortDatePattern
Set the short date pattern to day/month/year:
ZSGlobalization.ShortDatePattern = "dd/MM/yyyy"

member.name: P:ZS.ZSGlobalization.LongDatePattern
member.summary: Gets or sets the date and time pattern for long dates. Example: "dddd, MMMM dd, yyyy"
member.example:
Get the long date pattern:
longDatePattern = ZSGlobalization.LongDatePattern
Set the long date pattern to day of week, day month year:
ZSGlobalization.LongDatePattern = "dddd, dd MMMM yyyy"

member.name: P:ZS.ZSGlobalization.NumberDecimalSeparator
member.summary: Gets or sets the number decimal separator. Example: "."
member.example:
Get the number decimal separator:
decimalSeparator = ZSGlobalization.NumberDecimalSeparator
Set the number decimal separator to a comma:
ZSGlobalization.NumberDecimalSeparator = ","

member.name: P:ZS.ZSGlobalization.CurrencySymbol
member.summary: Gets or sets the currency symbol. Example: "$"
member.example:
Get the currency symbol:
currencySymbol = ZSGlobalization.CurrencySymbol
Set the currency symbol to Euro:
ZSGlobalization.CurrencySymbol = ""

member.name: P:ZS.ZSGlobalization.TextInfo
member.summary: Gets the text information (casing) of the current culture. Example: "Invariant"
member.example:
Get the text info:
textInfo = ZSGlobalization.TextInfo

member.name: P:ZS.ZSGlobalization.TwoLetterISOLanguageName
member.summary: Gets the ISO 639-1 two-letter code for the language of the current culture. Example: "en"

member.name: P:ZS.ZSGlobalization.ThreeLetterISOLanguageName
member.summary: Gets the ISO 639-2 three-letter code for the language of the current culture. Example: "eng"

member.name: P:ZS.ZSGlobalization.ThreeLetterWindowsLanguageName
member.summary: Gets the Windows three-letter code for the language of the current culture. Example: "ENU"

member.name: P:ZS.ZSGlobalization.NativeName
member.summary: Gets the native name of the language of the current culture. Example: "English"

member.name: P:ZS.ZSGlobalization.HijriDate
member.summary: Gets the current date in the Hijri calendar.

member.name: P:ZS.ZSGlobalization.ChineseDate
member.summary: Gets the current date in the Chinese calendar.

member.name: P:ZS.ZSGlobalization.GregorianDate
